thread.title: Natalie L
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Natalie L

author: Natalie L
title: Natalie L
text: Collecting my order in store was painless, and it had arrived quickly. On the way out I set off the alarms - a security tag hadn't been removed from one of the items, in the unopened bag. "That always happens," said the staff member. In fairness, she had come rushing over, and rushed away to get it sorted out. Not a problem at all.
